title: Mesoporous Fe3O4/SiO2/poly(2-carboxyethyl acrylate) composite polymer particles for pH-responsive loading and targeted release of bioactive molecules
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23560-23573
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03160A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Most. Nusrat Jahan, Md. Ashraful Alam, Md. Mahabur Rahman, S. Manjura Hoque, Hasan Ahmad
A mesoporous pH-responsive Fe3O4/SiO2/poly(2-carboxyethyl acrylate) composite is synthesized for targeted drug delivery to the upper small intestine and colon, where the pH is relatively alkaline.
